definition: copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: The top of the funnel is connected to a tube.
sentences.chinese: 通过杯状或漏斗状吹口吹奏的铜管乐器。

sentences.english: An organ stop that produces a tone like that of the brass wind instrument.
sentences.chinese: 铜管乐器家族中任何一种像喇叭带有筏的乐器。

sentences.english: Jazz's brass instruments are often played alongside drums and stringed instruments.
sentences.chinese: 爵士乐中的铜管乐器通常会和鼓以及弦乐器一起演奏。

sentences.english: He plays in the brass of the orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 他在管弦乐团里演奏铜管乐器。
小喇叭和号角都是铜管乐器。

sentences.english: There are also early brass and keyboard instruments.
sentences.chinese: 这里还有早期的铜管乐器和键盘乐器。

sentences.english: Our band has some of the best brass players in the country.
sentences.chinese: 我们乐队有几个全国最好的铜管乐器演奏家。

sentences.english: A large, valved , brass wind instrument with a bass pitch.
sentences.chinese: 大型带活塞的低音铜管乐器。

definition: double reed wind instrument (such as oboe or bassoon)
bassoon (loanword)/also written 巴頌管|巴颂管[ba1 song4 guan3] or 低音管[di1 yin1 guan3]
